long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
!Note!

OKAY SO I'M DOING A MAJOR UPDATE

and it's gonna be awesome

and remove support for gogoanime and animeseason

sorry

BUT IT'S AWESOME

and it'll take maybe two months to make it.
-----


A Small extension just to log the fancy animu you watch, just so that when you clear your browser history from all the 'adult content', you can still keep the most important things in there, your beloved ANIMU!

Not only that, but they're easily accessible with a clear interface!

Add your custom history marks to add an anime you've watched with a mobile, or add an anime you want to watch, just so you wont forget it!

Also blocks any unwanted ads on KissAnime.

Anime logger (still) has:
-Two styles!
It has an KissAnime style, with white background and green objects, but also an opposite: GogoAnime style with black background and orange objects, so you can choose which one's to your likings!

-Four supported sites!
Anime logger supports 4 sites, KissAnime, GogoAnime and Animeseason! And a bonus: KissCartoon! Just so you may not limit what you're watching to only anime. (If, like, you ever need to watch something else.)

-Background actions!
Ever feel like clicking the button on the logger for every anime you watch? Well, you can do that too... but! Anime logger has background support to save it automatically!
You will never have to worry about using your mouse to save anime...

And don't forget that Anime Logger blocks all the ads in KissAnime. That counts as a background action, right?

-Fancy switchs!
Just to change whether or not you want for Anime Logger to spy on every ecchi you watch, you can toggle background log easily off! And if you like like your erotic ads, you can turn them on!

(No pun intended)



It's not like i want you to download this or anything...

baka.
